events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-04-28 involving another vehicle at an intersection.
The incident was categorized under Auto Accident due to the reported collision involving a passenger vehicle.
A claims agent specializing in vehicle accidents was assigned to handle the customer's case promptly.
An acknowledgment message was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
The agent requested accident photos, police report, and vehicle registration details to process the claim further.
The customer uploaded all requested documents including photos of the damaged vehicle and the official police report.
The claims team began investigating the claim by reviewing submitted evidence and contacting involved parties.
All relevant facts and documentation were verified, concluding the investigation into the car collision.
A settlement offer was issued to the customer covering repairs and medical expenses related to the accident.
The customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the handling and settlement offer.
The claim was formally approved following acceptance of the settlement proposal by the insured party.
The settlement funds were transferred to the customer's account successfully without delay.
The claim file was officially closed after full payment and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
